UnitType.Backstory:
You were chosen by vote, after a display of magic, to lead the Carian military and act as its channeler. You say nothing of your life before.
When the Carian came upon a dying Quendar, there were gasps when you recognized her by name, and stayed with her until death.
May they have their fun speculating about your origins. They would wish to forget the truth, if they knew from whence you came, and from what monsters you learned the channeler's art.
These people, with their ideals of equality, cannot be expected to survive in this harsh world. Yet you cannot turn away from their cause.

The Carian, or Black Mancers as they were called in Capitar, are a people of strong family ties. For unknown reasons, they have never held their own state, instead integrating into other rich societies and earning respect as achievers and strong learners. They have been distrusted for this, even at times hated - but their innate cunning have made them an enduring people. And now that the world is broken, their time to rise as a Res Publica of their own has come.
